title: Investment Portfolio Diversification
description: A comprehensive exploration of portfolio theory, asset allocation strategies, and diversification principles that reduce investment risk while maintaining return potential. Students learn to build age-appropriate portfolios, understand correlation between asset classes, and implement rebalancing strategies for long-term wealth building.
learning_objectives: Analyze how diversification reduces portfolio risk through correlation principles
Construct balanced investment portfolios using appropriate asset allocation strategies
Evaluate the relationship between portfolio diversification and expected returns
Apply rebalancing strategies to maintain target asset allocation over time
Design age-appropriate investment portfolios aligned with time horizon and risk tolerance

skill_builder.title: Portfolio Diversification Builder
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students construct diversified investment portfolios by selecting asset allocations across stocks, bonds, and other investments, then visualize correlation effects, risk-return tradeoffs, and how different allocation strategies perform under various market conditions.
